DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine patient satisfaction tolerability Evie® slow-release insemination device US population . Additionally , assess cramping device determine pregnancy rate use slow insemination device compare standard IUI .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion : Infertile woman age ≤39 undergo first IUI cycle relatively unexplained infertility IRB approval inform consent sign Exclusion criterion : Women < 18 ≥40 year old Women abnormalities uterine cavity Women tubal occlusion History document pelvic adhesion endometriosis Uncorrected ovulatory dysfunction Uncorrected thyroid function AMH < 1 ng/mL < 5 million total motile sperm expect insemination prior analysis day sperm preparation insemination
